titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony in writing, documents, and representation in Whitnum v. Town of Greenwich, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/25/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes: (1) Senator Richard Blumenthal to produce testimony in writing and relevant office documents in the case of Whitnum v. Town of Greenwich, et al., except concerning matters for which a privilege or objection should be asserted; and (2) the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Senator, his office, and any employee of the Senator's office in connection with such case.
